title: A Star is born
creator_credit: Standard Motor Products Ltd and Cine Service
brief_description: The story of the Vanguard Spacemaster with long low lines, an impressive front end and new body panels that give new and bigger doors. Special features of the external bodywork, the chassis, engine, internal fittings and actual performance on the road are illustrated.
